description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (partly erased). 17 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh in black ink. Dark cream glazed paper with laid and chain lines visible. On fol. 1a: Title ; several inscriptions. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Autograph, dated Damascus, 25 Ṣafar 736 (colophon, fol. 8a). Incipit: بسم ... اخبرنا الشيخ عز الدين ابو الغر عبد العزيز بن عبد المنعم ... الحرانى التاجر بقراتى عليه بظاهر القاهرة Explicit: قالوا كيف يا رسول الله قال انما مال احدكم ما قدّم ومال وارثه ما اخّر
author: Birzālī, al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad, 1267-1339
abstract: Autograph copy of selections from Kitāb al-Bukhalāʼ of al-Khaṭīb al-Baghdādī (d. 463/1071).
title: al-Muntaqá min Kitāb al-Bukhalāʼ.
provenance: Four statements of reading (partly obliterated) on fol. 8a-b, the first by Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Faʻmah al-Maqdisī, dated 26 Ṣafar 736. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: برزالي، القاسم بن محمد
subject: Arabic literature—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
